Articles.Content:
I've been trying to build a rocket, and whenever I build a certain rocket that used to work perfectly (after 1.6 update) is not working. It's a simple rocket, similar to the Falcon heavy or Delta IV heavy. It has alot of DeltaV so I like to use it. What will happen is I will check my aerodynamic forces and it is below the ground, and not on the centre of the rocket. The other overlays are normal but it's always the aerodynamics. I use MechJeb and Kerbal engineer. I wasn't using the MechJeb case on this rocket. I doubt it is those mods, but if you suspect it is please tell me. Just a quick edit, unless I get out of KSP and get back in the bug will stay with any rocket.

Thanks

Edited January 30, 2019 by Kerbka47A
forgot to add a note
Have you tried adding fins to the rocket?
